Signup_SCENE_Notes_Text_1:
This application can be played in full
without spending any money.
(There are items available for purchase.)
Signup_SCENE_Notes_Text_3:
Be sure to get permission from your guardian
(such as your mom or dad) before you purchase
anything, or make the purchase together!
Signup_SCENE_Notes_Text_4:
Please see the Terms of Use for more information
and be sure to have a guardian read through the
Terms of Use with you before you begin playing.
Signup_SCENE_VersionUp_Popup_Text_2:
A new version of the app is available.
Please update to the latest version.
Signup_SCENE_VersionUp_Popup_Text_3:
A new version of the app has been
released. Please update to the
latest version.
Signup_SCENE_DataDownload_Popup_Text_1:
An update will now be downloaded.
(Size: 	�촁 MB)
Signup_SCENE_DataDownload_Popup_Text_2:
We recommend that you perform this
download over a Wi-Fi connection.
Signup_SCENE_DataDownload_Popup_Text_3:
Game data will now be downloaded.
(Size: 	�촁 MB)
Signup_SCENE_TermsConfirm_Text_1:
Before you can play Pokémon Sleep, you must
read and agree to the Terms of Use and
Privacy Notice.
Signup_SCENE_TermsConfirm_Text_2: I agree to the Terms of Use
Signup_SCENE_TermsConfirm_Text_3: I agree to the Privacy Notice
Signup_SCENE_TermsConfirm_Text_4:
Your save data, including your tracked
sleep sessions, will be saved to our server.
Signup_SCENE_TermsConfirm_Text_5: I agree to this use of my data

Signup_SCENE_TermsUpdate_Popup_Text_1:
The Terms of Use and/or Privacy
Notice have been updated.
Signup_SCENE_TermsUpdate_Popup_Text_2:
Please read them and confirm that
you agree.
Signup_SCENE_TermsReconfirm_Popup_Text_1:
The Terms of Use and/or Privacy
Notice require your confirmation.
Signup_SCENE_TermsReconfirm_Popup_Text_2:
Please read them and confirm that
you agree.
Signup_SCENE_CacheClear_Popup_Text:
Clearing your cache may help the app
run better. Your saved progress will
not be deleted.
Do you want to clear your cache?
Signup_SCENE_CacheClearFinished_Popup_Te:
Your cache was cleared successfully.
Please restart the app.
Signup_SCENE_AlreadyInherited_Popup_Text:
This account's save data has been
transferred to another device.

Please play on the device your
save data was transferred to.
Signup_SCENE_BanAccount_Popup_Text_2: You cannot use it to play.
Signup_SCENE_SDKAgree_Text_1:
In order to improve our service and provide
advertisements and information tailored to
players, Pokémon Sleep collects the
following types of information:
Signup_SCENE_SDKAgree_Text_4:
We would appreciate if you would agree to
this use of your data so that we can
improve the service we provide.
Signup_SCENE_SDKAgree_Text_5:
Even if you don't agree, you'll still be able
to use Pokémon Sleep.
Signup_SCENE_LanguageChoicePopup_Text: Is this the language you want to use?
Signup_SCENE_BirthdatePopup_Text:
Please confirm your date of birth
to continue. Is this accurate?
Signup_SCENE_IDFAPermission_Text: Information gathered by this app, including identifiers for advertising, are used to study trends in how our service is used, help us operate the service effectively, and prevent illicit use of the service.
Signup_SCENE_DataInherit_Text:
Welcome to Pokémon Sleep.
How would you like to begin?

Data was transferred from this
account within the past hour, so

Signup_SCENE_NGword_Popup_Text_1:
Your username contains words or
characters that are not allowed.
Signup_SCENE_NGword_Popup_Text_2:
We apologize for the inconvenience,
but please enter a different username.
Signup_SCENE_NGword_Popup_Text_3:
The list of words that cannot be used
in usernames has been updated.
Signup_SCENE_BrazilBmode_Popup_Text:
We sincerely apologize, but you
cannot use this app.
Signup_SCENE_Username_Text_2:
You can use up to 12 characters.
Please don't use your real name or
any other personal information.
You can change this later.
Signup_SCENE_UsernamePopup_Text: Is this the username you want to use?
